resources.string: CPU Widget Needs Special Permissions To Access Data So Grant Shizuku/Su Access To Use It.
Shizuku Is Required For This App To Function. Please Start Shizuku And Try Again.
Notifications For Screen Wake Lock Status
No GIF widgets found. Please add one first.
At least two GIF widgets are required to sync.
Please select exactly two widgets to sync.
Select Two GIF Widgets to Sync
This app requires usage access permission to help save more battery and display network usage data. Please grant the permission in settings.
Please disable battery optimizations for better performance
Detects when you\'re on the home screen to optimize widget updates
Warning: This may cause higher battery drain
Please grant the following permissions to use the app:

The Accessibility Service helps Widgets Pro optimize performance and battery usage. It allows the app to detect when you are on your home screen (launcher). Widgets only update frequently when they are visible on the launcher. This permission is optional but recommended for the best experience.

The Accessibility Service and Usage Access helps Widgets Pro optimize performance and battery usage. It allows the app to detect when you are on your home screen (launcher). Widgets only update frequently when they are visible on the launcher. This permissions are optional but recommended for the best experience.

Shizuku is needed for certain widgets, like the CPU Monitor, to access specific system information (e.g., CPU usage and temperature). It provides a secure way to grant these permissions without requiring full root access.
Join our Telegram channel for support and updates: https://t.me/widgets_pro
Foreground Service: Allows app services (like monitors for CPU, Battery, Network) to run tasks visible to the user (via notification) when the app isn\'t directly open.
Foreground Service Data Sync: Specifically allows foreground services to perform reliable data transfers or syncs (like fetching widget data).
Battery Stats: Allows reading battery usage data, used by the Battery widget. (Protected permission).
Post Notifications: Needed on Android 13+ to show notifications, like the one for running services.
Wake Lock: Allows the app to keep the screen awake (for Caffeine widget) or keep the CPU running for background tasks.
Foreground Service System Exempted: A restricted permission for specific system-level services to potentially bypass limitations.
Schedule/Use Exact Alarm: Allows scheduling tasks (like widget updates) at precise times.
Bluetooth: Allows basic Bluetooth communication (connecting, transferring data) for the Bluetooth widget.
Bluetooth Connect: Needed on Android 12+ to connect to paired Bluetooth devices for the Bluetooth widget.
Internet: Allows the app to connect to the internet to fetch data like weather/sun info or device images.
Access Cache Filesystem: Allows reading/writing cache files. (Often protected).
Bluetooth Admin: Allows discovering and managing Bluetooth settings, used for Bluetooth widget setup.
Access Fine Location: Allows getting precise location (GPS, network), used by the Sun Tracker widget.
Receive Boot Completed: Allows the app to restart services/widgets after the device reboots.
Access Coarse Location: Allows getting approximate location (network), used by the Sun Tracker widget, often as a fallback for fine location.
Request Ignore Battery Optimizations: Allows asking the user to disable battery saving for this app to ensure background services run reliably.
Package Usage Stats: Allows accessing app usage data, needed for the WiFi and SIM Data Usage widgets.
Read Media Images/Video: Needed on newer Android to access images or videos. Used by the GIF widget to select files.
Bind Notification Listener Service: Allows the Media Monitor service to read media info from notifications for the Music widget.
Record Audio: Allows access to the microphone for the music visualizer feature.
Modify Audio Settings: Allows changing global audio settings, potentially used by the music visualizer.
Interact Across Users Full: System-level permission related to the Shizuku provider[cite: 30], allowing interaction across user profiles. (Requires system signing).
Huge thanks to MET Weather API

To optimize widget updates and save battery, Widgets Pro needs Accessibility Service access.

This allows the app to:
 • Detect when you are on the home screen (launcher) by monitoring window changes.
 • Retrieve the name of the currently active app for this detection.

This information is used ONLY to reduce widget update frequency when they aren't visible. No personal data is collected or shared.
A fun spin the bottle game widget.
